docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 27 (UP) -- A group of educators and intellectuals from nine American countries cabled Argentine President Juan D. Peron today asking for the release of several hundred university students imprisoned for more than two months.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 27 (UP) -- A group of educators and intellectuals from nine American countries cabled Argentine President Juan D. Peron today asking for the release of several hundred university students imprisoned for more than two months.
docs.abstract: Group of Latin-Amer intellectuals wires Pres Peron asking release of jailed students

headline.main: APPEAL SENT TO PERON; He Is Asked to Free Argentine Students Held for Protesting
